EmailTemplate.name: Online Payment (without Academic Credit)
EmailTemplate.subject: LSTM Fee Payment Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Student_Programme__c.Student__c},
Student ID Number: {!Contact.LSTM_No__c} Course: {!Student_Programme__c.Programme__c} Start Date: {!Student_Programme__c.Programme_Start_Date__c}
LSTM have partnered with Flywire to provide you with an easy and secure method of sending fee payments in your home currency. You can pay by bank transfer, debit/credit card and e-wallet methods.
The fee for this course is {!Student_Programme__c.Invoice_Amount__c}.
How to pay:
1. Visit lstmed.flywire.com and choose your country 2. Input the amount you are paying in GBP
Payment by bank transfer or international debit/credit card = {!Student_Programme__c.Invoice_Amount__c} Payment by domestic UK credit/debit cards in GBP = {!Student_Programme__c.UK_Card_Payment_Fee__c} (incl. 2% fee)
3. Choose your payment method and make your payment to Flywire 4. Enter your details and if you are paying on behalf of a student, the details of the student you are paying for 5. Track and confirm your payment by email, SMS, or by logging into lstmed.flywire.com
Yours sincerely
Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine Pembroke Place Liverpool L3 5QA United Kingdom
